title: Deadpool & Wolverine Quick Review
description:
Check out our Screencast for the full review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bqGRj6aQvCk

transcript_chunks.text: Tim we just watched Deadpool and Wolverine what did you think I am thrilled to say that Deadpool and Wolverine lives up to any expectations that I feel like it's set out to accomplish it functions as a Deadpool 3 a sequel to the Deadpool movies that came before it it functions as a nice checking on where the MCU is good and bad and where it might be going uh but most importantly it is an event film that is filled with laughs with action with excitement with hype I do not think it's going to be a wild thing to say that the Deadpool trilogy is arguably one of the best trilogies that we've seen in superhero movies period this movie special Roger am I off Bas on this no not at all I am definitely a jaded Marvel fan and the entire movie I just had a massive smile on my face I think this is going to surprise a lot of people haters and fans alike I could not agree more with the smiles I literally my face hurts right now from last night smiling the entire time it's a very smile worthy movie

to surprise a lot of people haters and fans alike I could not agree more with the smiles I literally my face hurts right now from last night smiling the entire time it's a very smile worthy movie and I can't wait to see it again
